msTools

  • View page source

maya_setup¶

Data¶

str DOCK_NAME

str TOOL_NAMESPACE

str TOOL_NAME

Functions¶

def install()

def uninstall()

Description¶

Manage installation of the Doc Explorer tool within the current Maya session.

The Doc Explorer provides a view for exploring the documentation of various APIs including:

  • Maya Python API 2.0
  • Maya Python Commands
  • PySide2

The msTools.tools.tool_manager can be used to retrieve existing Doc Explorer tools using the TOOL_NAMESPACE and TOOL_NAME.

msTools.tools.docExplorer.maya_setup.DOCK_NAME = 'DocExplorer_WorkspaceControl'¶

The widget name given to the cmds.workspaceControl() when docking a Doc Explorer tool.

Type:str
msTools.tools.docExplorer.maya_setup.TOOL_NAMESPACE = 'MRS'¶

The tool namespace used to register a Doc Explorer tool with the msTools.tools.tool_manager.

Type:str
msTools.tools.docExplorer.maya_setup.TOOL_NAME = 'Doc Explorer'¶

The tool name used to register a Doc Explorer tool with the msTools.tools.tool_manager.

Type:str
msTools.tools.docExplorer.maya_setup.install(dock=True)¶

Force install a Doc Explorer tool to the Maya main window or a dock control.

Forced installation means that any existing Doc Explorer tool will be uninstalled before installation. The new tool will be registered with the msTools.tools.tool_manager.

Parameters:dock (bool) – Whether to dock the Doc Explorer tool. If False, the tool will be parented to the Maya main window. Defaults to True.
Returns:The new Doc Explorer tool.
msTools.tools.docExplorer.maya_setup.uninstall()¶

Uninstall all existing Doc Explorer tools.

Any uninstalled tool will be deregistered from the msTools.tools.tool_manager.
